enquiryParametersChangeMail.body: Hello, We would like to inform you that the parameters of the transport offer No. {{enquiryNumber}} (route {{loadingCity}} - {{dischargeCity}}), in which you have shown interest, have been modified. Please click on the link below and check if the new parameters are relevant to you. Transport No. {{enquiryNumber}} Thank you for your understanding and have a nice day. Best regards
enquiryParametersChangeMail.subject: Change of transport parameters No. {{enquiryNumber}}

enquiry.emailWinnerBody: Hello, You have won transport No. {{enquiryNumber}} ({{loadingCity}} - {{dischargeCity}}). We will send you a transport contract in the following email. If for any reason you are unable to carry out the transport, please write us an email. Wishing you a nice day
enquiry.emailLooserBody: Hello, We would like to inform you that the offer for transport No. {{enquiryNumber}} ({{loadingCity}} - {{dischargeCity}}), in which you expressed interest, has already been closed. Don't worry, we will continue to regularly inform you about new orders through our system. Thank you for your understanding and have a nice day. Best regards, Jindrich Machan Qapline

deliveryEmail.body:
Hello, 

In the attached file, you will find the information about the delivery to your company. 

Best regards
deliveryEmail.subject: Delivery information
deliveryEmail.mailSendingPartiallyFailed: Sending the delivery notification to the following email addresses failed: {{emails}}. Everything else was successful
deliveryEmail.mailSendingSucceeded: Sending the delivery notification was successful for all recipients

delivery.title: Delivery Confirmation
delivery.fromCompany: We will be unloading following goods at your facility from {{company}}
delivery.freeVehicle: This vehicle might not be completely at capacity. Contact us if interested in any transport.

loading.forCompany: We will be loading goods from your company for {{company}}.

genericConfirmation.changes: You will be informed in case of any changes.

about.title: What do we do?
about.doing: We organize for you the truck transport across Europe and all over the world.
about.deadlineDelivery: We deliver your goods in required limit.
about.dangerous: We are able to transpot your dangerous goods in accordance with ADR.
about.oversized: We can handle with your oversized cargos.
about.anywhere: We transport your goods from/to any harbor in the world and ensure the subsequent distribution in the given country.
about.insurance: We ensure additional insurance of the transported cargo beyond CMR.
about.askUs: Ask us about our estimate for concrete (truck or container) transport. We reply by return. We believe, you will be pleasantly surprised.

invoicePdf.delivery_facturation: We invoice you for the following transports:
invoicePdf.issuer_cin_message: Registered at the Regional Court in Brno, Section C, File 77167. The company is a VAT payer.

dischargePdf.title: Exact unloading address + position information:
dischargePdf.new_loading_list: Due to NEUTRALIZATION, the driver will fill out a new CMR consignment note!
dischargePdf.original_docs: The driver must keep all original documents from loading and must not hand them over, confirm, or show them at all!
dischargePdf.cmr_list: In the new CMR consignment note, the driver will fill in:
dischargePdf.palets: The number of pallets and the type of goods will be copied from the CMR consignment note received at loading.
dischargePdf.warning_first: KEEP ALL ORIGINAL DOCUMENTS, they must not be visible during unloading!
dischargePdf.warning_second: STRICT NEUTRALIZATION! High penalties from the customer are possible!
dischargePdf.new_cmr: Have the newly filled CMR consignment note confirmed during unloading.
dischargePdf.no_other_documents: DO NOT HAND OVER ANY OTHER DOCUMENTS, otherwise
dischargePdf.payment_danger: the payment for transportation is at risk! - Strict neutralization!
dischargePdf.info_first: Please send these documents, including delivery notes from pallets /if there are any/, back to our address with the newly filled and confirmed CMR.
dischargePdf.info_second: In case of any uncertainties, feel free to contact us anytime.

orderPdf.title: Transportation Contract No.
orderPdf.order_text: hereby orders transportation from the carrier according to the specification below
orderPdf.our_code: Our code: /please always include on the invoice/
orderPdf.invoice: Upload invoice + delivery notes on this link
orderPdf.axact_address: We will provide the exact address after loading.
orderPdf.legal_text: Contract between the intermediary and the carrier, the subject of which is the carrier's commitment to carry out the agreed transportation and the intermediary's commitment to pay the agreed price for it, arises at the moment when the carrier confirms the order by email back to the email from which the order came. The carrier undertakes to carry out the transportation with its own means of transport. Without the written consent of the intermediary, the conclusion of further partial contracts is not allowed. The carrier agrees with the intermediary on the payment term of the invoice for transportation within 45 days from the receipt of the tax document. At the moment of concluding the contract, the carrier undertakes to comply with the General Terms and Conditions of the intermediary, which are available at https://www.qapline.com/terms-and-conditions, and which the carrier familiarized himself with before accepting the above order.

texts.thanks: thank you for your interest. Your enquiry has been received.
texts.contact: We will contact you soon to discuss the exact price and next steps.

template.contactForHelp:
We are happy to help you with anything.
Feel free to contact us via email or phone.
template.emailNotShowingCorrectly: Is the email not displaying correctly? Click here
template.disclaimer:
By sending any order, confirming it, or making a payment, you agree to the Terms and Conditions
of QapLine spol. s r.o., which you can find below, and you declare that you have been acquainted with them.
We strongly urge you to review them. Unless any offer from your side is explicitly confirmed by us
in its entirety and without reservations, it does not constitute the conclusion of any obligation and until the binding
confirmation of the summarized order, it is non-binding communication.

invoicePaymentReminderMail.subject: Invoice payment reminder
invoicePaymentReminderMail.body:
Dear Mr./Ms.,

We would like to kindly remind you that invoice no. {{invoiceNumber}}, issued on {{issueDate}}, with a due date of {{dueDate}}, has not yet been paid.

Please review and arrange payment of the amount {{price}} {{currency}} to our account {{bankAccount}}, using variable symbol {{invoiceNumber}}.

If the payment has already been sent, please let us know so we can update our records.

Should you have any questions, feel free to contact us at info@qapline.com.

Thank you for your cooperation.

Best regards,

repeatedInvoicePaymentReminderMail.subject: Urgent invoice payment reminder
repeatedInvoicePaymentReminderMail.body:
Dear Mr./Ms.,

We would like to remind you once again that invoice no. {{invoiceNumber}}, issued on {{issueDate}} and due on {{dueDate}}, remains unpaid.

The amount of {{price}} {{currency}} is still outstanding. Please arrange immediate payment to our account {{bankAccount}}, using variable symbol {{invoiceNumber}}.

If the payment has already been made, kindly inform us as soon as possible so we can update our records. Otherwise, we request that you process the payment without delay.

Should there be any issues regarding the payment, please contact us at info@qapline.com or by phone at +420 774 009 933.

Thank you for addressing this matter promptly.

Best regards,

texts.title: Registration to the Qapline system
texts.description:
Hello,

the company you wanted to register on the Qapline portal is already registered.
texts.contactColleague: For further information, contact the account owner at the address:

texts.title: Registration to the Qapline system
texts.description:
Hello,

to complete the registration, please confirm your email. The link below will allow you to complete the registration.

texts.title: Registration to the Qapline system
texts.description:
Hello,

the company you wanted to register on the Qapline portal already exists. If you are the account owner, please contact us at the address:

texts.title: You have been invited to the Qapline system
texts.description:
Hello,

you have been invited to the Qapline system by user {{senderEmail}}. Please fill in your personal details and complete your registration.
